title: Riot changed a paid summoner icon without warning (and imo made it look worse)
body:
The arcade poro icon was only available in a 1495 bundle. This was my favorite icon, and I'm really disappointed in what they changed it to. I'm not sure if I still would have bought the pack if the icon was what it is now.

Riot, please change this back. It's not right to alter things like this after people already paid for them.

Edit: To clarify, I don't want a refund and I'm not here for sympathy RP. I just thought this was a really cool icon, and doing massive changes to icons people paid for is a bad precedent. Skins I can understand, but this has no effect on gameplay...
